additionalinformation: UPnP support for network setup and configuration Motion detection to trigger recording and send e-mail alerts
protocols: TCP/IP ARP UDP ICMP DHCP DDNS NTP DNS SMTP FTP HTTP PPPoE UPnP LLTD
systemrequirements: Operating System: Microsoft Windows XP, Vista, Windows 7 Internet explorer 6 or above , Firefox 3.5 or above, safari 4
marketinginformation: the DCs-930/930l is a unique and versatile surveillance solution for your home or small offce. Unlike a traditional webcam, the DCs-930/930l is a complete system with a built-in CPU and web server that transmits high quality video images for security and surveillance. simple installation and an intuitive web-based interface offer easy integration with your ethernet or 802.11n wireless network. the DCs-930/930l also comes with remote monitoring and motion detection features for a complete and cost-effective home security solution.
